domChanges.content: <style id="youtube-download-helper-style" type="text/css">.ytd-plus-button {display:none!important} .ytdh-button {position:relative;display:inline-block;box-sizing:border-box;min-width:5.14em;padding-top:10px;padding-right:16px;padding-bottom:10px;padding-left:16px;margin:auto 4px;white-space:nowrap;border-radius:2px;border:none;background-color:#ff0000;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:1.3rem;font-family:Roboto,​Arial,​sans-serif;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:.007px;color:white;cursor:pointer;} .ytd-plus-panel {min-width:69px;display:none;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;z-index:99999;background-color:var(--yt-dialog-background);padding:5px 0;box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)} .ytd-plus-ul {list-style-type:none;padding-left:15px;padding-right:15px;} .ytd-plus-ul button {width:100%;text-align:left;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:left;background-color:var(--yt-dialog-background);border:none;padding-top:5px;padding-bottom:5px;font-size:1.2rem;color:var(--yt-primary-text-color);cursor:pointer;} .ytd-plus-ul button:hover {background-color:var(--yt-menu-hover-backgound-color);}</style>
